init.env: if ! (cd azion || exit $?;rm -rf cells-site-template;git clone https://github.com/aziontech/cells-site-template.git); then echo "Failed to clone cells-site-template"; return 2; fi; if ! (cd azion/cells-site-template || exit $?; npm ci); then echo "Failed to install cells-site-template dependencies"; return 1; fi;
